reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

title.narrative: Strengthening CITIES Compliance and Law Enforcement in Southeast Asian Parties.

description.narrative: Conserve biodiversity and manage natural resources in ways that maintain their long-term viability and preserve their potential to meet the needs of present and future generations. Activities include combating illegal and corrupt exploitation of natural resources and the control of invasive species. Programs in this element should be integrated with the Agriculture Area under Economic Growth and Conflict Mitigation and Reconciliation Area under the Peace and Security Category, when applicable and appropriate.

This award strives to conserve biodiversity and manage natural resources in ways that maintain their long-term viability and preserve their potential to meet the needs of present and future generations. Activities include combating illegal and corrupt exploitation of natural resources and the control of invasive species. This includes The purpose of this project is to support key Parties in Southeast Asia in their efforts to improve their CITES compliance and enforcement systems in areas where needs have been expressed, and thereby support their efforts in tackling illegal trade in wildlife..
